text: Jared Kushner discussed policy w/ Saudi leaders at same time his brother was working on a business deal with their top aides.

text: Jeffrey Epstein evades NY requirement that high-risk sex offenders check in every 90 days w/ police by claiming Manhattan mansion as vacation home. In New Mexico, where he owns 7,600-acre ranch, he doesn't have to register as sex offender at all.
author: bethreinhard

text: “It’s unbelievably upsetting,” said atty for 14-yr-old who long believed she was at the heart of the case. “The rug has been swiped out from under the one girl who was brave enough to come forward and break this thing.”
author: bethreinhard

text: Federal probe into alleged sexual misconduct by Jeffrey Epstein flagged 40 underage victims, including 14-year-old who first told police. But prosecutors chose older victim for solicitation charge, easing his requirements as a registered sex offender. https://www.washingtonpost.com/investigations/age-of-victim-in-prosecution-of-jeffrey-epstein-long-a-source-of-confusion-eased-his-obligations-to-register-as-a-sex-offender/2019/03/17/57063cd8-4035-11e9-a44b-42f4df262a4c_story.html …
author: bethreinhard

text: New Mexico, where Epstein owns a 7,600-acre ranch, doesn't require him to register as sex offender at all because his victim was not under 16. Federal prosecutors flagged 40 underage victims but he only pleaded to one state count of solicitation of a minor.
author: bethreinhard

text: But Epstein hasn't checked in with NYC since before the hearing. The police say he doesn't have to. The judge stands by her interpretation of the law.
author: bethreinhard

text: Epstein is classified as a high-risk offender in NY. Atty tried to downgrade his risk level bc he would have to check in every 90 days and his 19,000-sq-ft mansion is only a vacation home. “He can give up his New York home if he does not want to come every 90 days,” a judge said.
author: bethreinhard

text: In Paris, where Epstein owns a home near the Arc de Triomphe, the sex-offender registry is not public. In the Virgin Islands, where he owns the entire island of Little St. James, he only has to check in once a year. There is no police presence on the private island.
author: bethreinhard

text: There's the sex offender who has to live under a bridge because of all the bans on living near schools and parks. And then there's Jeffrey Epstein, w/ homes in Paris, Palm Beach, NM, Virgin Islands and NYC. And w/ private planes to hop btwn them. https://www.washingtonpost.com/investigations/age-of-victim-in-prosecution-of-jeffrey-epstein-long-a-source-of-confusion-eased-his-obligations-to-register-as-a-sex-offender/2019/03/17/57063cd8-4035-11e9-a44b-42f4df262a4c_story.html?utm_term=.c996a0ad3b55 …
author: bethreinhard

text: Labor sec/former US Atty Alex Acosta has defended Jeffrey Epstein plea deal bc required sex offender registration. But laws to track such offenders play out differently for multimillionaire w/ planes and homes in NY, Paris, FL, NM and the Virgin Islands. https://wapo.st/2TOXe4L?tid=ss_tw&utm_term=.c996a0ad3b55 …
author: bethreinhard

text: A 14-yr-old girl was first to report multimillionaire Jeffrey Epstein to police & long believed she was victim attached to guilty plea. But prosecutors actually chose older teen, easing his burdens as registered sex offender. W/ @kimberlykindy @JulieATate  https://wapo.st/2TOXe4L?tid=ss_tw&utm_term=.c996a0ad3b55 …
author: bethreinhard

text: “He is more incredible in person than I think you would even think as you see him on TV,” she told Alabama radio show. “He treats everyone as if they are a part of his family.” She said she expected to be given a job as the “second in command” at the U.S. embassy in Lisbon.
author: bethreinhard

text: UPDATED: Former Trump campaign staffer who says he kissed her w/o consent said as recently as May 2017 that president is "just the nicest guy." Her lawyer said she was bound by NDA at the time and trying to get job in the administration.
author: bethreinhard

text: A chance to work at Trump campaign headquarters in NY was offered and abruptly rescinded in Sept. 2016. Johnson also applied unsuceessfully for two jobs in the administration. She says she was disappointed by these developments but they did not affect her decision to sue Trump.
author: bethreinhard

text: Two alleged witnesses--Pam Bondi, then FL AG, and Karen Giorno, Trump campaign chief in FL, also dispute Johnson’s account. “I’m a prosecutor, and if I saw something inappropriate, I would have said something,” Bondi said,
author: bethreinhard

text: Johnson told her boyfriend and parents about the alleged kiss the same day, an account they confirm. A Florida attorney she consulted two months later gave The Post text messages showing that he considered her “credible” but did not take her case for business reasons.
author: bethreinhard

text: While more than a dozen women have publicly accused Trump of kissing or groping them, Johnson is only accuser to come forward since the president took office and only one to allege unwanted contact during the campaign. She filed suit Monday in federal court in Florida.
author: bethreinhard

text: Trump campaign staffer says he gave her unwanted kiss on her mouth before Florida rally in 2016. “I can still see his lips coming straight for my face,” Alva Johnson told the Post. White House denies it happened. With @Alice_Crites https://wapo.st/2IKaYtk?tid=ss_tw&utm_term=.c90481020d61 …
author: bethreinhard
